Kowalski takes over as Skipper excuses himself to go on his fitness quest. The brainy bird appears to do a bang-up job in the leadership role – are Skipper’s days at the helm over but he’s too chicken to admit it?

81416.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
81416.description: The Space Agency intends to send one of the chimps to the moon. In the opinion of certain flightless waterfowl, this important mission would be much better served by sending a flightless waterfowl instead. Private proves to be best suited for the trip (believe it or not) and with the help of a clever monkey suit disguise, he ends up on the moon.

81417.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
81417.description: When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

88233.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88233.description: When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out it’s to free her brother Francis who happens to be a “mind-jacked” Dr. Blowhole.

88234.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88234.description: Rico’s beloved doll, Miss Perky, has a new line of princess accessories! Joy! But in order for Skipper to reward the loco penguin with the new swag he must fill a marble jar (one marble in for good behavior, one marble out for bad.) How in the world is Rico supposed to behave and fill the jar when King Julien has kidnapped his dolly with the intention of marrying her?

88254.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88254.description: The Space Agency intends to send one of the chimps to the moon. In the opinion of certain flightless waterfowl, this important mission would be much better served by sending a flightless waterfowl instead. Private proves to be best suited for the trip (believe it or not) and with the help of a clever monkey suit disguise, he ends up on the moon.

88255.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88255.description: When a sneeze from Rico causes the underground tunnel system beneath the zoo to rupture Skipper calls in 4 beavers to fix the situation. // Skipper's having one of those perfect days, and he decides to use the opportunity to settle an old score.

88265.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88265.description: When the Penguins lose access to their favorite snack, popcorn, Skipper and crew leap into action to gain a new supply of the salty treat. // When a camera falls from the sky into the lemur habitat, Julien and Maurice argue about who will keep the shiny toy. But when Maurice disappears in the struggle, the Penguins are called in to find the missing lemur.

88266.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88266.description: When the zoo installs web cams to bring in new visitors, Private accidentally becomes an Internet star. // Skipper accidentally causes King Julien to lose his beloved crown. The penguins go on a dangerous mission to retrieve the crown from the sewer.

88274.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88274.description: Sick of Julien's annoying presence, the penguins decide to take a vacation on The Moon. // After Marlene is frightened by a spooky noise in the night, she and Skipper travel down to the sewer below the zoo to find the source of the scary moans.

88275.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88275.description: When stuffed Mort dolls become popular at the zoo, Julien gets jealous and get them recalled. Unfortunately, the real-life Mort is accidentally sent back to the factory along with his plush replicas. // Maurice bribes the zoo animals to celebrate “King Julien Day” by offering them candy. Only Skipper refuses to go along, but still he’s unable to avoid the annoying day.

88285.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88285.description: Marlene discovers a lost egg, and asks the penguins to care for it and keep it safe. But King Julien is jealous, and wants to raise the egg to be his second in command. // When Skipper steals the batteries to Julien’s stereo, he sets off a wild chase around the zoo that gets both of them stuck in the habitat of an angry kangaroo.

88286.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88286.description: The penguins compete against the lemurs in a game of capture the flag. This should be easy for the crack penguin team, but for some mysterious reason the lemurs keep beating them to the flag. // Mort is kicked out of the lemur habitat after he touches King Julien’s feet one too many times. So, the penguins take him in and attempt to break him of his foot obsession.

88287.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
88287.description: Marlene goes over to meet the newest zoo animal, and she mysteriously disappears. The penguins and lemurs attempt to rescue her, but they are taken, too. All except for Kowalski, the last penguin standing. // When Julien is taken to the zoo infirmary for acting even weirder than usual, Maurice is left in charge. Everything goes smoothly, until suddenly Maurice is acting even crazier than Julien ever did.

94865.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94865.description: The penguins and lemurs face off in a race. The penguins in a souped-up version of their car and the lemurs in Alice's zoo cart. Winner takes the loser's car! // Alice gives Rico a tummy-settling medicine just after he swallows a ticking time bomb.

94866.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94866.description: As the zoo starts feeding them imitation fish cakes, the penguins take matters into their own flippers and hatch a plan to hijack a fish delivery truck. // During a particularly cold day, the rats show up and challenge the penguins to a hockey match.

94886.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94886.description: When Doris the Dolphin shows up with Parker the Platypus and asks a favor of Kowalski, he instantly jumps to her rescue only to find out it’s to free her brother Francis who happens to be a “mind-jacked” Dr. Blowhole.

94887.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94887.description: Rico’s beloved doll, Miss Perky, has a new line of princess accessories! Joy! But in order for Skipper to reward the loco penguin with the new swag he must fill a marble jar (one marble in for good behavior, one marble out for bad.) How in the world is Rico supposed to behave and fill the jar when King Julien has kidnapped his dolly with the intention of marrying her?

94897.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94897.description: As the vet gathers the penguins to give them a shot, Skipper's fear of needles takes over and he goes on the run. // During a solar eclipse, Phil and Mason convince the bossy Julien that the sky spirits are angry at him. He starts acting extra-nice.

94898.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94898.description: Mort is exposed to Kowalski's super-ray, and he grows super-big and strong. // Marlene gets a new roommate! At first, she's excited to have a new best friend. But her attitude changes when her roommate turns out to have some pretty disgusting habits.

94906.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94906.description: The rats have been terrorizing Roger the alligator. He asks the penguins for help. Their solution: swap Roger's brain with Rico's, and let the but kicking begin! // A robot is sent to the zoo to learn the habits of lemurs before it's sent into space.

94907.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94907.description: When the penguins bring Marlene with them on a sno-cone mission in the park, she can't handle the freedom of being outside the zoo walls. // Max the cat is on the run from evil animal control Officer X, and he comes to the penguins for help.

94917.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94917.description: When Rico gets a freaky fortune from his cookie, he initially ignores it. Julien sets out to make Rico's fortune come true. // A female chimp named Lulu arrives at the zoo for a short stay, and Phil is smitten. Unfortunately, Lulu falls for Mason.

94918.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94918.description: On watch-duty, Private sees a terrifying Skorka: a sky orca whale. No one believes it exists, so Private sets out to battle the Sorka on his own. // When the penguins are interrupted mid-operation by a nosey scientist, they leave the zoo in danger.

94919.title: The Penguins of Madagascar
94919.description: A little girl loses her doll at the zoo, and Rico gives up his own doll to replace it. Private assures Rico that his good deed will come back to him. // When a raccoon shows up and starts stealing from the zoo animals, the penguins jump into action.
